The burn cost increase is equal to the spell level increase applied by the feat. Augmenting a spell increases its casting time as if it were cast spontaneously.

**Special:** You can take this feat more than once. Each time you take this feat, select another metamagic feat; you can augment a spell with multiple feats by accepting additional points of burn equal to the total increased spell level.

metamagical_synergy.name: Metamagical Synergy
description: ## Metamagical Synergy (Coven, Teamwork)
{SOURCE Blood of the Coven/13}
You and the other members of your coven can weave your spells together to great effect.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Allied Spellcaster}.

**Benefit:** If all three coven members with this feat cast the same spell in the same round, you can combine your efforts, resolving the spell only on the last member's initiative. The effects of the spell are resolved only once, but the coven can apply one of the following metamagic feats without altering the spell slot used: {feat/Empower Spell}, {feat/Enlarge Spell}, {feat/Extend Spell}, {feat/Maximize Spell}, or {feat/Widen Spell}. Casters do not need the appropriate metamagic feat to apply it via this feat. The synergy spell resolves using the caster level, save DC, and other modifiers of the caster of the coven's choice. The spell does not apply other metamagic feats unless all three members included the same feat in their casting. This ability cannot be used if the chosen metamagic feat would normally alter a spell to use a spell slot above 9th level.

meteor_swing.name: Meteor Swing
description: ## Meteor Swing (Combat)
{SOURCE Martial Arts Handbook/26}
The power of your blow leaves your enemies reeling.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Weapon Focus} with bludgeoning weapon, base attack bonus +6.

**Benefit:** As a standard action, make a single attack with your chosen weapon. If the attack hits, the target must succeed at a Reflex save with a DC equal to 10 + your base attack bonus or lose its ability to make attacks of opportunity until the beginning of your next turn. When your base attack bonus reaches +11, you can instead cause the target to lose its Dexterity bonus to AC. When your base attack bonus reaches +16, you can instead cause the target to become {rule/flat-footed}. You can use this feat's benefits only once per minute.

mighty_bite.name: Mighty Bite
description: ## Mighty Bite (Combat)
{SOURCE Monster Codex/224}
Your rending claws expose your opponent's vital organs to your teeth.
**Prerequisites:** Base attack bonus +6, bite attack, {umr/rend}, {monster/troll}.

**Benefit:** If you deal damage to a creature with your rend ability, the critical threat range of your bite attack becomes 18-20 until the start of your next turn. This increase does not stack with other effects that increase your bite's critical threat range (such as the {magic-enh/keen} weapon special ability or the {feat/Improved Critical} feat).

mighty_boughs.name: Mighty Boughs
description: ## Mighty Boughs
{SOURCE Wilderness Origins/10}
Your wings are particularly strong and sprout sharp barbs.
**Prerequisites:** Str 15, character level 11th, {race/gathlain}.
**Benefit:** You gain two wing attacks. These are secondary natural attacks that deal 1d3 points of slashing damage (or 1d4 if you are Medium).

mind_strike.name: Mind Strike
description: ## Mind Strike (Combat)
{SOURCE Chronicle of Legends/9}
Your {ability/sneak attack/s} strike not only your target's body but also their willpower.
**Prerequisites:** Ranged legerdemain class feature.

**Benefit:** Whenever you deal sneak attack damage, you fluster your foe, causing your target to take a penalty on Will saves equal to the number of sneak attack dice you rolled on the attack for 1 round. This penalty does not stack with itself, but each time you deal sneak attack damage to an affected target, the duration is extended by 1 round.

mindful_meditation.name: Mindful Meditation
description: ## Mindful Meditation (Meditation)
{SOURCE Blood of the Beast/28}
You clear your mind of stress and emotion by focusing on calming breathing exercises.
**Prerequisites:** Wis 11, {feat/Meditation Master}.

**Benefit:** For 24 hours after you meditate, you gain a +1 bonus on Will saving throws against charm, compulsion, emotion, and fear effects, and increase the Bluff DC to feint you and the Intimidate DC to demoralize you by +5. These bonuses increase by 1 for every 5 Hit Dice you have to a maximum increase of +4 at 20 Hit Dice.

mindfulness_mastery.name: Mindfulness Mastery
description: ## Mindfulness Mastery (Meditation)
{SOURCE Blood of the Beast/29}
The act of meditation allows you to steel your mind against mental attacks.
**Prerequisites:** Wis 19, {feat/Meditation Master}, {feat/Mindful Meditation}, character level 13th.

**Benefit:** For 24 hours after you meditate, whenever you fail your saving throw against a charm, compulsion, emotion, or fear effect, you can attempt a new saving throw again 1 round later at the same DC. You get only this one extra chance to succeed at your saving throw.

minor_miracle.name: Minor Miracle
description: ## Minor Miracle
{SOURCE Divine Anthology/11}
You can call upon your deity for a minor miracle.
**Prerequisites:** Wis 12, Knowledge (religion) 5 ranks, alignment must match that of your worshiped deity.

**Benefit:** Choose two domains associated with your deity (if you have access to one or more domains already, the chosen domains can be the same ones you already have access to, or different ones). Once per day, by presenting a holy symbol of your deity and calling out in supplication, you can cast the 1st-level spell associated with either of the two chosen domains as a spell-like ability. You choose which domain's spell you cast at the time you use the ability. Your caster level for this effect is equal to your total Hit Dice, and the saving throw DC, if any, is Charisma-based.

minor_spell_expertise.name: Minor Spell Expertise
description: ## Minor Spell Expertise
{SOURCE Advanced Player's Guide/165}
You are able to cast a 1st-level spell as a spell-like ability.
**Prerequisites:** Ability to cast 4th-level spells.

**Benefit:** Choose one 1st-level spell that you know. You may cast that spell twice per day as a spell-like ability. The caster level for this spell-like ability is equal to your caster level in the class from whose spell list the spell is taken. The spell-like ability's save DC is Charisma-based. If the spell has an expensive focus or material component, it may not be chosen for this feat. You cannot apply metamagic feats to this spell.
**Special:** You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new spell.

minotaurs_charge.name: Minotaur's Charge
description: ## Minotaur's Charge
{SOURCE Classic Monsters Revisited/43}
Your charge sends foes reeling away, knocking them to the ground.
**Prerequisites:** Str 13, {feat/Improved Bull Rush}, powerful charge.

**Benefit:** When you hit an opponent with a {rule/charge} attack, you might also initiate a {rule/bull rush} as a free action. This does not require you to move into your opponent's square and does not provoke an attack of opportunity. If you successfully push your opponent 15 feet or more, he is also knocked {rule/prone}.

mirror_kin.name: Mirror Kin
description: ## Mirror Kin (Teamwork)
{SOURCE Inner Sea Races/207}
Combining your cunning with illusion magic makes you and your allies nearly indistinguishable.
**Prerequisites:** Bluff 8 ranks, {race/gnome}, gnome magic racial trait.

**Benefit:** Whenever you're adjacent to any gnome allies who also have this feat, your appearance and mannerisms change into an amalgam of the features of you and your allies, making you and your allies look exactly alike. Your shapes occasionally appear to blend into each other, making it impossible to distinguish you and granting you and any affected allies a 20% miss chance due to {rule/concealment}. This is an illusion (figment) effect.

Spells and effects that don't require an attack roll, such as area spells, affect you normally. An attacker must be able to see and reach both you and your ally to be fooled. If you're invisible or the attacker is blind, the feat has no effect. Because this feat relies on the fact that both you and your ally are blending together to create the visual illusion, it doesn't function with effects like the inquisitor's solo tactics class feature; both you and the ally must possess the feat. If you have more than one adjacent ally with this feat, this feat applies to all allies who qualify.

mirror_move.name: Mirror Move
description: ## Mirror Move (Combat)
{SOURCE Melee Tactics Toolbox/7}
By tracking an opponent's movements, you can attempt to duplicate his techniques.
**Prerequisites:** Int 13, {feat/Combat Expertise}, base attack bonus +4.

**Benefit:** If you are the only character threatening an opponent and that opponent uses a combat feat (including taking an action that benefits from a combat feat, or gaining any bonus to AC, attack rolls, damage rolls, or saving throws from a combat feat), you can take an immediate action to gain the benefit of that feat until the end of your next turn. You must meet all the feat's prerequisites. If a feat has a daily use limitation, as does {feat/Stunning Fist}, any uses of that feat while you're using Mirror Move count toward that feat's daily limit for you. You can use Mirror Move once per day for every 4 levels you have attained.
>**Combat Trick** (from the {feat/Combat Stamina} feat)
>{SOURCE Armor Master's Handbook/21}
>You can spend up to 5 stamina points to extend the duration that you benefit from a mirrored feat by 1 round per stamina point spent.

mischievous_tail.name: Mischievous Tail
description: ## Mischievous Tail
{SOURCE Planar Adventures/30}
Your tail seems to have a mind of its own.
**Prerequisites:** Dex 15, {feat/Grasping Tail}, you must have a tail.

**Benefit:** You can use your tail for all purposes as though it were a free hand, though you cannot effectively wield weapons or shields with it (you can still carry such objects with your tail, as long as such an object could also be comfortably carried in a hand normally). In addition, you gain a +2 bonus on {rule/disarm} and {rule/steal} combat maneuvers and Sleight of Hand checks performed using only your tail, and combat maneuvers performed this way do not provoke attacks of opportunity.

misdirection_attack.name: Misdirection Attack
description: ## Misdirection Attack (Combat)
{SOURCE Ultimate Intrigue/87}
After misdirecting your opponent's weapon attack, you leave your opponent open to further violence.
**Prerequisites:** Int 13, {feat/Combat Expertise}, {feat/Deceitful}, {feat/Misdirection Redirection}, {feat/Misdirection Tactics}, Bluff 10 ranks.

**Benefit:** When you successfully use the Misdirection Tactics feat to negate a melee weapon attack, the opponent whose attack you negated provokes an attack of opportunity from you, even though you normally can't take attacks of opportunity while using the total defense action. This effect is in addition to the effect gained from Misdirection Redirection.

misdirection_redirection.name: Misdirection Redirection
description: ## Misdirection Redirection (Combat)
{SOURCE Ultimate Intrigue/87}
After misdirecting your opponent's weapon attack, you trick it into striking someone else.
**Prerequisites:** Int 13, {feat/Combat Expertise}, {feat/Misdirection Tactics}, {feat/Deceitful}, Bluff 10 ranks.

**Benefit:** When you successfully use the Misdirection Tactics feat to negate a melee weapon attack, you redirect your foe's attack and trick your foe into striking another creature of your choice within the foe's melee reach. To resolve this attack, your foe must make a new attack roll against the new target.

misdirection_tactics.name: Misdirection Tactics
description: ## Misdirection Tactics (Combat)
{SOURCE Ultimate Intrigue/87}
You have learned to use deception and trickery to misdirect your opponent's weapon attack.
**Prerequisites:** Int 13, {feat/Combat Expertise}, {feat/Deceitful}, Bluff 4 ranks.

**Benefit:** While you are using the {misc/total defense} action, if a melee attack would still hit your AC, you can attempt a Bluff check with a DC equal to the foe's attack roll as an immediate action. If you succeed at the check, you negate the attack (treat it as a miss). If the attack still hits, you cannot use this feat against the same opponent for 24 hours.

missile_shield.name: Missile Shield
description: ## Missile Shield (Combat)
{SOURCE Advanced Player's Guide/165}
You are skilled at deflecting ranged attacks with your shield.
**Prerequisites:** Dex 13, {feat/Shield Focus}.

**Benefit:** You must be using a light, heavy, or {eq-armor/tower shield} to use this feat. Once per round when you would normally be hit with an attack from a ranged weapon (not including spell effects, natural attacks, or massive ranged weapons), you may deflect it so that you take no damage, as if you had the {feat/Deflect Arrows} feat. You must be aware of the attack and not {rule/flat-footed}.
>**Combat Trick** (from the {feat/Combat Stamina} feat)
>{SOURCE Pathfinder Unchained/127}

>As long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool, you can use this feat with a {eq-armor/buckler}. You can spend 5 stamina points to deflect an arrow even while you're flat-footed. You must still be aware of the attack.
### Mythic Missile Shield
{SOURCE Mythic Adventures/69}
Your remarkable awareness allows you to deflect multiple ranged attacks and even ray spells.
**Prerequisites:** Missile Shield.

**Benefit:** When using Missile Shield, you can deflect an additional number of ranged attacks per round equal to half your tier. You can expend one use of mythic power as an immediate action to deflect a single ray from a ray spell or effect targeting you.

mixed_scales.name: Mixed Scales
description: ## Mixed Scales
{SOURCE Kobolds of Golarion/24}
You have two colors of scales, which mark you as special.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Draconic Aspect} or dragon-scaled racial trait, {race/kobold}.

**Benefit:** Choose an additional color for your Draconic Aspect feat or dragon-scaled racial trait. You gain the benefits of both this color and the color you originally chose. (If you have both Draconic Aspect and dragon-scaled, this benefit applies to both.) If you gain abilities that rely on scale color, choose which color gains the benefits.

mobile_acrobat.name: Mobile Acrobat
description: ## Mobile Acrobat
{SOURCE Blood of the Beast/7}
You harness your acrobatic momentum to quickly propel yourself forward.
**Prerequisites:** Racial bonus to Dexterity.
**Benefit:** When attempting an {skill/Acrobatics} check that would reduce your speed, treat your base speed as 10 feet faster before making speed reductions.

mobile_bulwark_style.name: Mobile Bulwark Style
description: ## Mobile Bulwark Style (Combat, Style)
{SOURCE Armor Master's Handbook/12}
You are able to swing your tower shield around quickly.
**Prerequisites:** Str 13, {feat/Shield Focus}, {feat/Tower Shield Proficiency}, base attack bonus +1.

**Benefit:** While using a {eq-armor/tower shield}, add the shield's bonus to AC (including its enhancement bonus) to your CMD against {rule/bull rush} and {rule/overrun} combat maneuvers. While using this style, you can use a tower shield to grant you total {rule/cover} along one edge of your space as a move action.

mobile_fortress.name: Mobile Fortress
description: ## Mobile Fortress (Combat)
{SOURCE Armor Master's Handbook/12}
You use your tower shield to defend yourself or an ally at a moment's notice.
**Prerequisites:** Str 15, {feat/Mobile Bulwark Style}, {feat/Shield Focus}, {feat/Tower Shield Proficiency}, base attack bonus +4.

**Benefit:** While using a {eq-armor/tower shield}, you add half of the shield's bonus to AC (including its enhancement bonus) to your touch AC and take only a -1 penalty on attack rolls because of the shield's encumbrance. While using Mobile Bulwark Style, whenever you would use a tower shield to gain total {rule/cover}, you also grant any adjacent ally total cover against attacks passing through the selected edge of your space.
